GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.77
GSD.description:
ARC: mm: fix leakage of memory allocated for PTE

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.77 by commit 14009ada5712649589ab4ad0441b811780ea8773, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit d9820ff76f95fa26d33e412254a89cd65b23142d. For more details please see the references link.
